attributes.additional_details:
In May 2014 my 5 year old son unfortunately had to dial 999 whilst witnessing an attack on myself (his mother).

From a young age I have always discussed the use and importance of 999. If I hadn't have taught him this I would not be here today, to help raise awareness of how important it is that all children understand when to use the emergency services and how to ask for help, please help get this issue raised to those that can make it happen by signing and sharing this petition.

Thank you in advance
